urls.title: Leave Less - Overview
urls.description: Air Canada recognizes that we must do our part to minimize our environmental footprint. We are committed to a net-zero emissions goal from all global operations by 2050 by continuing to leave less and do more. Explore how we’re flying towards a greener future. Air Canada takes great pride in being a global airline. With that, however, comes global responsibilities and people rightly look to us to help solve the challenges facing our planet. For our company and industry, this is probably no more pertinent

data.text: We are committed to net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050 with new aircraft technologies, sustainable aviation fuels, and carbon offset programs. Visit link in bio for more details. https://t.co/SnYvaELcjC https://t.co/caY5vVgvt9

urls.title: Laisser moins – Aperçu
urls.description: À Air Canada, nous sommes conscients que nous devons prendre des mesures pour réduire notre empreinte écologique. Nous nous sommes donné un objectif de carboneutralité de toutes nos activités à l’échelle mondiale d’ici 2050 en continuant de laisser moins et d’en faire plus. Découvrez comment nous nous envolons vers un avenir plus vert. Air Canada est extrêmement fière d’être une société aérienne mondiale. Ce statut s’accompagne toutefois de grandes responsabilités et on s’attend à juste titre à ce que

data.text: Nous nous engageons à atteindre la carboneutralité d’ici 2050 grâce à de nouvelles technologies aéronautiques, à des carburants durables et à des programmes de compensation des émissions de carbone. https://t.co/ESGOXPnmJD https://t.co/3Lp2cPcL53

urls.title: Lost and Found
urls.description: Please note that NYC Transit now offers shipping of recovered lost items. When the item is found, having your item(s) shipped saves you a trip to the Lost and Found Office, at the 34th Street-Penn Station lower mezzanine of the A, C and E subway train lines. We encourage you to take advantage of this shipping convenience. It’s fast, easy, and safe. Please, always wait for an email and/or text message from us if you want to pick up a found item before dropping

data.text: @MelissaCoombs3 Hi Melissa, we invite you to submit the Lost and Found form found here https://t.co/aKmGYs3Vjk. You will then be notified as soon as the item is reported as found. /Max

urls.title: Flight Disruptions
urls.description: We’re committed to providing the highest quality of service to all our customers, and we believe it’s important to make our service commitments readily available to you. If your flight ope rated by Air Canada, Air Canada Rouge or Air Canada Express was disrupted, we’re here to assist and provide you with some helpful resources.

data.text: @starros028 Hello, we are sorry to learn about your flight disruption and apologize for any inconvenience caused by this issue. We invite you to take a look at our policy for delayed and cancelled flights here: https://t.co/9CUFBPwu0C /Vincent
